item.description:
Due to the upcoming bad weather, I am moving this event

to the Milford, Connecticut Post Mall.

Please change your RSVP to No if you cannot come.

Go to the Target,

Go to their Starbucks.

I will have a purple backpack on the table to find me.

I will have to put the backpack back into the car before

going to the movie.

The movie starts at 7:10 but with previews it will

probably be more like 7:30.

Hope to see you there.

If the weather report changes that the shoreline will also

get early snow instead of rain, then this Meet Up

might  be  cancelled.

 

A Good Day to Die Hard, the 4 th in the Die Hard Series.

A.

John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1606378/

www.imdb.com/title/tt1606378/

 

B.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Good_Day_to_Die_Hard

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Good_Day_to_Die_Hard

C.

http://hotair.com/archives/2013/02/17/film-review-a-good-day-to-die-hard/

hotair.com/archives/2013/02/17/film-review-a-good-day-to-die-hard/

 

This MU depends on the weather.

If there is bad weather then this MU will be cancelled.

I have a longer drive than some of those others who might

be attending this event so I need to go based on my

commute to this event.

I have been getting some good reviews from those who

saw it the weekend of Feb. 16.
item.how_to_find_us: Come into the Starbucks Coffee section of Barnes and Noble.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: U Z@ A Good Day to Die Hard Moved to Milford Theaters
